A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie has great scenes and has some exciting action. But this movie relies on plots that were never mention in either the original or the prequel trilogy. Don't believe all the subverting expectations garbage\, because the movie still sucks. Ryan Johnson decidedly threw all the questions introduced in Episode 7 in the garbage. The movie is mostly spent on a tiny ship with hardly any conflict or lack of tension we see in other Star Wars Films. Go watch The Phantom Menace its better than this
